name: Miscreation
description:
In the catacombs beneath Malerin, a group of wizards resided. In pursuit of evolutionary perfection, the began to experiment on creatures, mutating them in horrifying ways Soon, their thirst for knowledge led them to experiment on a human. The spell went awry killing it's casters and leaving the test subject alone in the catacombs, mutated, half mad with pain. To survive, he must feed the mutations growing inside him by feasting on the other Miscreations.

This game was created in 48 hours for the Discord Game Jam 5 It was created by
  • Jeff Burke
  • Hamish Seymour
  • Rohan Burke
  • Liam Seymour
Software used
  • Game engine:  Unity
  • Models and animation:  Blender
Assets used
  • Ultimate Game Music Collection
  • Universal Sound FX
  • Everything else was made by us
